attributes.action: We instruct the UK politicians to stop party politics, and vote for an election.
attributes.additional_details: The "zombie" nature of the parliament is being maintained by some political parties and MP's to ensure they stay in the House of Westminster for political  gain. This stalemate is doing massive damage to the UK economy.
attributes.background: It is clear that parliament is broken and the elected government cannot govern. Many elected MP's are not obeying the instructions of their electorates. Several MP's have changed parties without fighting a by-election which has further impaired the working of Westminster.
